DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine incidence , long term outcome factor relate postoperative delirium elderly patient non-cardiac surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Incidence , Long- Term Outcome Factor Related Non- Cardiac Postoperative Delirium Elderly Patients

DOC.criteria: Age > / 60 year American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status 13 Undergoing schedule surgery Giving informed consent Impaired visual auditory disturbance Can communicate Thai language Undergoing neurosurgery
